must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: Real-time inventory updates for out-of-stock items
deal_breakers: Inaccurate inventory information leading to unavailable items

technical: A fast connection to the internet for something modern
An app that is easy to use but also has many features, like a cart that I think needs to be customizable
I believe some kind of AI assistant could help but I'm not sure how it works
non_technical: Good customer service that's available whenever I need it, or maybe just sometimes
A checkout process that is both quick and thorough, ideally with options I can choose from
I heard that having local options is important but I don't know what else to look for

must_meet: The order should be delivered on time, but I'm okay with it being late if it's worth it
There has to be a way to track the order, though I’m not sure what that looks like
should_meet: I think the app needs to provide discounts but only if they're good ones, whatever that means
It would be nice if they had something like a rewards program, but I can't tell if that's common
nice_to_meet: I would prefer if they had some sort of mobile-friendly site, maybe even an app, but I’m not picky
Availability of a variety of items might be helpful, but I'm not sure what constitutes variety
